Subjects: Machor, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Machor in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
for þat oyse is generaleIn haly kyrk
                    vniuersale…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…Out of þis lyf þat I may twynebut schame or deit or
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Attributed Title:
Explicit wita sancti macharij (f. 208v); morise (RT,
                        190v-198); machor (RT, 198v-208v)
